sen.e: Shigi Kenpo are personally designed draft of constitutions created privately before the issuance of the Constitution of the Empire of Japan in the Meiji period.

sen.j: 国会開設運動の高まりに伴い、憲法の必要性が認識されるようになり、1880年11月の国会期成同盟第2回大会で、翌年に憲法草案を持参することを決議したため、翌1881年に多数の私擬憲法がつくられた。
sen.e: With the growing demand for the establishment of a National Diet heating up, the need for a Constitution began to be recognized and with the decision to assemble designs of the draft of the Constitution the next year at the second Kokkai Kisei Domei (League for Founding a national Assembly), many Shigi Kenpo were created in 1881.

With the growing demand for the establishment of the National Diet, the need for a constitution began to be recognized, and in response to the decision made in the second Kokkai Kisei Domei (League for Founding a national Assembly) in November 1880 to assemble draft constitutions the next year, many Shigi Kenpo were created in the following year, 1881.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れ部を補いました。

sen.j: 内容は案によって様々で、抵抗権や革命権（東洋大日本国国憲按）を容認したもの、人民主権、議院内閣制を主張するもの、国民投票で皇帝を廃立する権利を規定したものもあった。
sen.e: The contents differed depending on the draft, some allowed the right of resistance and the right of revolution (Toyo Dai Nippon-koku Kokken-an [Draft of the National Constitution for Great Japan of the East]), some insisted that sovereignty resides with the people or on a parliamentary cabinet system, and some included the right to abolish the Emperor by national referendum.

The contents differed among drafts; some allowed the right of resistance and the right of revolution (Toyo Dai Nippon-koku Kokken-an [Draft of the National Constitution for Great Japan of the East]), some insisted that sovereignty should reside with the people or on a parliamentary system, and some included the right to dismiss an emperor from the throne by national referendum.
sen.cmt: 文法と表現を直しました。
sen.e: The contents differed among drafts; some allowed the right of resistance and the right of revolution (Toyo Dai Nippon-koku Kokken-an [Draft of the National Constitution for Great Japan of the East]), some insisted that sovereignty should reside with the people or on a parliamentary system, and some included the right to dismiss an emperor from the throne by national referendum.

sen.j: 1887年12月26日に制定、発布され、即日施行された保安条例によって、私擬憲法の検討及び作成は禁じられた。
sen.e: The Hoan-jorei (regulations for the preservation of law and order) was established, issued and became effective on the same day of December 26, 1887, reviewing and creating Shigi Kenpo was banned from then on.

Consideration and creation of Shigi Kenpo were banned by Hoan-jorei (regulations for the preservation of law and order) which had become effective on December 26, 1887, the same day of its establishment and issuance.

sen.j: これにより、私擬憲法が政府に持ち寄られて議論されることはなく、大日本帝国憲法に直接反映されることはなかった。
sen.e: With this, there were no more Shigi Kenpo brought to the government for discussion in regard to the Constitution of the Empire of Japan.
sen.cmt: 「大日本帝国憲法に直接反映されることはなかった。」の部分ですが、持ち寄られて議論される私擬憲法がなければその後の大日本帝国憲法に直接反映されないのは当然で、文章の流れとしておかしいのではないかと思います。
sen.e: Because of this, Shigi Kenpo were no longer brought to the government for discussion and thus were not directly reflected in the Constitution of the Empire of Japan.
sen.cmt: and thusでつなげる文章にすれば、文章の流れとしておかしいことはないと思います。
